search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session
| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session,Web.clientip | iplocation Web.clientip
|inputlookup WA_settings | fields value source | dedup value

input.label: Compare settings
input.choice: Compare against equivalent period in past day/week/month

search.query: | makeresults count=1 | eval site="$site$", span="$span$" | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | map search=" | union [ | tstats summariesonly=t count AS Count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site=\"$site$\" Web.eventtype=pageview (earliest=$$info_min_time$$ latest=$$info_max_time$$) GROUPBY _time $span$,Web.http_session,Web.ua_mobile ][ | tstats summariesonly=t count AS Count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site=\"$site$\" Web.eventtype=pageview (earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$) GROUPBY _time $span$,Web.http_session,Web.ua_mobile ] | timechart count AS Count,count(eval(len('Web.ua_mobile')=0)) AS Non-Mobile,sum(eval('Web.ua_mobile'!=\"\")) AS Mobile $span$ | timewrap \"$$windowLength$$\" | eval window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ | fields Non* Mobile* *Mobile Count window windowLength earliestCompare latestCompare info_min_time info_max_time $$FieldnameCurrentPeriod$$ $$FieldnameComparePeriod$$ " | table _time *latest* Count_latest* Count*_before | fields - Count_latest* latestCompare | fillnull value=0

| tstats summariesonly=t dc(Web.http_session) AS Count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview | stats sum(Count) AS Count | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t dc(Web.http_session) AS Count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" Web.eventtype=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ | stats sum(Count) AS CountCompare | eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats sum(max(Web.http_session_pageviews)) AS Count | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" Web.eventtype=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats sum(max(Web.http_session_pageviews)) AS CountCompare | eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| stats dc(Web.http_session) AS Sessions,sum(http_session_pageviews) AS Pageviews | eval "Pages / Session"=Pageviews/Sessions | eval "Count"=round('Pages / Session',2) | fields "Count" | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" Web.eventtype=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats dc(Web.http_session) AS Sessions,sum(http_session_pageviews) AS Pageviews | eval \"Pages / Session\"=Pageviews/Sessions | eval CountCompare=round('Pages / Session',2) | fields CountCompare | eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_duration) AS http_session_duration FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats avg(http_session_duration) AS AvgDuration | eval Count=round(AvgDuration, 0) | fieldformat Count = strftime(Count, "%M:%S") | fields Count

| stats count(eval(http_session_pageviews=1)) AS Bounces, count(eval(http_session_pageviews>1)) AS NonBounces | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/(Bounces+NonBounces)),2) | eval Count=Bouncerate | fields Count | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" Web.eventtype=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats count(eval(http_session_pageviews=1)) AS Bounces, count(eval(http_session_pageviews>1)) AS NonBounces | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/(Bounces+NonBounces)),2) | eval CountCompare=Bouncerate | fields CountCompare
| eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t dc(Web.user) AS Count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t dc(Web.user) AS CountCompare FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" Web.eventtype=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$
| fields CountCompare | eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session,Web.ua_family | fields Web.ua_family Web.http_session | dedup Web.http_session | top Web.ua_family countfield=Sessions | eval percent=round(percent, 2) | eval percent=percent."%" | rename percent AS "% Sessions" | rename Web.ua_family as Browser

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview Web.ua_mobile!="" GROUPBY Web.http_session,Web.ua_mobile | dedup Web.http_session | top Web.ua_mobile countfield=Sessions | eval percent=round(percent, 2) | eval percent=percent."%" | rename percent AS "% Sessions" | rename Web.ua_mobile AS "Device"
| fields Country Web.http_session | dedup Web.http_session | top Country countfield=Sessions | eval percent=round(percent, 2) | eval percent=percent."%" | rename percent AS "% Sessions"

| fields City Web.http_session | dedup Web.http_session | top City countfield=Sessions | eval percent=round(percent, 2) | eval percent=percent."%" | rename percent AS "% Sessions" | replace "" with "(not set)" in City

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session,Web.http_locale | rex mode=sed field=Web.http_locale "s/_/-/" | eval http_locale=lower('Web.http_locale') | fields http_locale Web.http_session | dedup Web.http_session | top http_locale countfield=Sessions | eval percent=round(percent, 2) | eval percent=percent."%" | rename percent AS "% Sessions" | rename http_locale as Language

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session,Web.ua_os_family | dedup Web.http_session | top Web.ua_os_family countfield=Sessions | eval percent=round(percent, 2) | eval percent=percent."%" | rename percent AS "% Sessions" | rename Web.ua_os_family AS "Operating System"
| stats dc(Web.http_session) as count by Country | geom geo_countries featureIdField="Country" allFeatures=true
